messages.subject: Dodd, Lovejoy & Bears..oh my!  12 days left to register for GBHL
messages.msgSnippet: Just 12 days left to register for the Great Big Happy Life Unschoolers Conference Retreat - June 7-10, 2010 in West Milford NJ www.greatbighappylife.com Come
messages.messageBody:
Just 12 days left to register for the Great Big Happy Life Unschoolers
Conference Retreat -

June 7-10, 2010 in West Milford NJ

www.greatbighappylife.com



Come and join us for a beautiful and unique 3 day Unschooling Experience-



There are only 5 rooms left in the main building for families (like ours)
who prefer a roof to a tent J



Not only will participants be able to absorb the wisdom of the longtime
unschoolers Erika Davis-Pitre and Sandra Dodd, but we are lucky to announce
that Kelly Lovejoy, radical unschooling mother and magician behind the
inspirational Live and Learn Conferences will join our lineup of amazing
facilitators. In addition, Faith Void, creator of the Enjoy Life
Unschooling Conference and the Unschooling blog carnival
http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/blog-carnival/ will be presenting.



We are delighted!



Hula hooping, superhero breakfast, tshirt smashing, a tiger safari, foraging
tour,

a music jam session and temporary hair art are also on the menu.



What will you and your family bring to this awesome gathering?





Visit our website at www.greatbighappylife.com.



Sincerely

Jen and Chris

Pnkn314@...







[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
